lead_paragraph: The rebuilding plans of the woeful Toronto Maple Leafs received a shot in the arm when they won the first overall selection in the National Hockey League draft lottery on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Toronto Win Draft Lottery, Get First Overall Pick
headline.main: Toronto Win Draft Lottery, Get First Overall Pick
